/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, capturing the cityscape in a 360-degree view. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the road, bare trees stand tall, their leafless branches reaching towards the sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, a body of water can be seen, adding a serene element to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and enhancing the colors of the cityscape.
